1.title: AR Experience
1.desc: This is a personal projet on augmented reality. The experience is developped with a-frame, web framework based on three.js.

2.title: Louvre Experience
2.desc: This is a school project in partnership with the Louvre Museum. As a team, we designed an immersive interactive experience narrating the story of an ancien artefact.

3.title: 3D Sound Experience: Worakls – Bleu
3.desc: This is a school project whose goal was to create an interactive music experience with Three.js.

4.title: SoundLines
4.desc: This is a school project whose goal was to create an interactive experience that reacts to music with 2D canvas.

5.title: Dataviz: BDDIVRE
5.desc: This is a dataviz school project. Based on promotional data, including alcohol consumption, this site provides an entertaining visualization of numerical information. The user scrolls, the illustrations give the illusion of being at a counter, ready to consume. Visually speaking, the project is realized in simple illustrations, in line, in two colors.

6.title: Emotional Chatroom
6.desc: This is a school project Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom Chatroom

7.title: Laboscope
7.desc: During my second year of DUT Informatique, IUT Sénart - Fontainebleau, I did an end of study internship at EDF laboratory I2R. (Hub Innovation Group which is located in Saclay). The laboratory has many incoming projects, the problem is to find a way to visualize the number of projects, the workload of contributors spread over different projects, to find out who has free time in the week to work on new projects. I developed Laboscope, an internal tool allowing the visualization and the storage of data to answer the needs of putting in production of a tool of archiving, planning and project management.
